name: base-n
description: Convert base of selected and cursor position Unicode. Real-time value displayed in the Atom status bar.
readme:
# base-n
Convert base of selected and cursor position Unicode. Real-time value displayed in the Atom status bar.

![base-n](http://share.rockymadden.com/kRDw+)

## Tidbits
* Clicking the status bar conversion value will to copy said value to your clipboard
* Bases 2 to 36 and 64 are supported
